Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.storage

Class BasicDepot

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.storage.BasicDepot
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResourceDepot, ResourceStash
public class BasicDepot
extends java.lang.Object
implements ResourceDepot
This class represents a depot of the basic type, which are present in the warehouse at the start of the game. This kind of depot can only contain one type of resource, it can only contain a finite amount of that resource, and no two depots of this kind can contain the same resource at the same time.

  • Method Details

    • addResource

      public void addResource​(ResourceType resource, int quantity) throws WrongResourceInsertionException, NotEnoughSpaceException, BlockedResourceException
      Adds the given resource to the storage
      Specified by:
      addResource in interface ResourceDepot
      Parameters:
      resource - the resource to be added
      quantity - the amount of resource to add to the amount stored
      Throws:
      WrongResourceInsertionException - if the type of the resource to be added cannot (currently) be added to the storage
      NotEnoughSpaceException - if the quantity of the resource to be added plus the amount already stored exceeds the maximum capacity
      BlockedResourceException - if the resource is being blocked by a different depot

    • isBlocking

      public boolean isBlocking​(ResourceType resource)
      Returns whether or not the depot is blocking a certain resource, meaning that no other depot of the basic type can contain it
      Specified by:
      isBlocking in interface ResourceDepot
      Parameters:
      resource - the resource that might be blocked
      Returns:
      true if the given resource is blocked by this depot

    • removeResource

      public void removeResource​(ResourceType resource, int quantity) throws NotEnoughResourceException
      Remove a certain amount of the given resource from storage
      Specified by:
      removeResource in interface ResourceStash
      Parameters:
      resource - the resource to be decreased in quantity
      quantity - the amount of resource to remove from the amount stored
      Throws:
      NotEnoughResourceException - if the given resource is present in storage in fewer quantity than the amount to be deleted
